displayName: Amazon RDS DB instances should not be idle
AWS Guard Duty service should be enabled on all regions of all AWS accounts
IAM users should not be inactive for more than 90 days
EC2 instances should not be publicly accessible on SSH port 22
EC2 instances should not have any publicly accessible ports
EBS snapshots should not be publicly accessible
EC2 instances should not be in stopped state for more than 60 days
EC2 instances should not be publicly accessible on port 80
Elastic Search endpoint should not be open to internet
Application ELB should not be exposed to internet
ClassicELB should not be exposed to internet
Lambda functions should not have administrative permissions
Non Admin IAM roles should not have full IAM access
API resource should have standard region
Appelb resource should have standard region
Dynamodb should have standard region
Efs resource should have standard region
Elasticache resource should have standard region
Elasticip resource should have standard region
Elasticsearch resource should have standard region
Emr resource should have standard region
Eni resource should have standard region
KMS resource should have standard region
Rdsdb resource should have standard region
Redshift resource should have standard region
VPC resource should have standard region
Asg should have standard region
Classicelb should have standard region
Lambda should have standard region
Launchconfig should have standard region
RDS Snapshot should have standard region
EC2 instance should have standard region
S3 should have standard region
Security group should have standard region
Snapshot should have standard region
Snstopic should have standard region
Stack should have standard region
Subnet should have standard region
EBS Volume should have standard region
RDS snapshot should not be publicly accessible
Redshift attached Security Group should not be publicly accessible
Security group with SSH port 22 should not be open to the internet
Application ELB  should be tagged with mandatory tags
Dynamo db should be tagged with mandatory tags
EC2 instances should be tagged with mandatory tags
EFS should be tagged with mandatory tags
RDS database should be tagged with mandatory tags
Redshift should be tagged with mandatory tags
S3 should be tagged with mandatory tags
EBS volumes should be tagged with mandatory tags
VPCs should be tagged with mandatory tags
Amazon EBS volumes should not be underutilized
Amazon Redshift clusters should not be underutilized
EBS volumes should not be in unused or untagged state
Application ELB should not be in unused state
EBS volumes should not be in unused state
Elastic Ip's should not be in unused state
VPC flowlogs should be enabled for all VPCs
RDS database endpoints should not be publicly accessible
EC2 instances should not be publicly accessible on port 8080
EC2 instances should not be publicly accessible on default MySQL port 3306
EC2 instances should not be publicly accessible on port 138
EC2 instances should not be publicly accessible on default WINDOWS RDP port 3389
EC2 instances should not be publicly accessible on default POSTGRESQL port 5432
EC2 instances should not be publicly accessible on default SQL Browser port 1434
S3 bucket should not have hosting website or redirecting requests
MFA should be enabled for Root User
Cloudtrail should be enabled in multi region
IAM certificate should not expire in mentioned days from current date
Access log should be enabled to App ELB and attached to mentioned bucket
Access log should be enabled to cloudfront and attached to mentioned bucket
All Cloud watch events from all accounts should be sent to DEDICATED ACCOUNTID default event bus
Amazon EC2 instances should not have low utilization
VPNGateway resources should be tagged with mandatory tags
Any Ec2 instance should not have S3 vulnerability
Any Ec2 instance should not have S4 vulnerability
Any Ec2 instance should not have S5 vulnerability
An Ec2 instance with remotely exploitable vulnerability (S5) should not be open to internet
Every EC2 instance should be scanned by Qualys vulnerability assessment tool atleast once a month
